amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the "summer of service" grant program and reduce the authorized amount designated for the program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 110-539 to strike the "summer of service" grant program and reduce the authorized amount designated for the program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 260 (Roll no. 105).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Flake.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 260 (Roll no. 105).
